sentences.sContent: Most babies can digest a wide range of food easily.
sentences.sCn: 大多数婴儿能轻易地消化很多种食物。

sentences.sContent: I struggled to digest the news.
sentences.sCn: 我费力地琢磨着那条新闻。

exam.question: Why should anyone want to read ________ of books by great authors when the real pleasure comes from reading the originals?

answer.explain: 句意： 既然真正的乐趣来自阅读原著， 那么为什么会有人愿意读名著的摘要呢？theme： 主题； insight： 见解力， 洞察力； leaflet： 传单， 小册子。

remMethod.val: di(分开) ＋ gest(运) → 分开运送 → 消化， 领悟； 参考： Reader’s Digest 《读者文摘》

words.tran: 做摘要者；助消化食品；汇编者；蒸炼器

trans.tranOther: to change food that you have just eaten into substances that your body can use
a short piece of writing that gives the most important facts from a book, report etc
